translations.true_target_text: Mō ētahi taiopenga, ko te nuinga o ngā kaitautoko o ngā huihuinga waiata nei ka hiahia ki te whakapuni ki rō papa, ā, ko te nuinga o ngā kaitautoko ka whakatau koinaka tētahi o ngā tīno wāhanga o te wheakoranga.

translations.source_text: If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music.
translations.pred_target_text: Mena kei te pirangi koe ki te tata ki te mahi me uru moata koe ki te tiki waahi puni e tata ana ki te puoro.
translations.true_target_text: Me kei te hiahia koe kia tata atu ki ngā mahi, me tae wawe atu koe kia whai wāhi atu ki tētahi puni tata ki ngā waiata.

translations.source_text: Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night.
translations.pred_target_text: Kia maumahara ahakoa kua mutu te waiata i runga i nga waahanga matua, tera pea etahi waahanga o te hakari ka purei puoro tae noa ki te po.
translations.true_target_text: Me maumahara ahakoa kua mutu pea te puoro ki ngā atamira matua, tērā ētahi wāhi o te hui ahurei e whakatangi puoro tai nuaku ana kia waenganui pō.

translations.source_text: Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko etahi o nga huihuinga he waahi puni motuhake mo nga whanau me nga tamariki nohinohi.
translations.true_target_text: Kei ētahi hui ahurei he wāhi tēneti motuhake mā ngā whānau whai tamariki nohinohi.

translations.source_text: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected.
translations.pred_target_text: Mena ka whakawhiti koe i te Raki o Baltic i te takurua, tirohia te waahi o te kaa, na te mea ka haere ma te hukapapa he ngangau kino mo te hunga kua pangia.
translations.true_target_text: Mēnā e whakawhiti ana koe i te awa ki Northen Baltic, tirohia ngā wāhi hōpuni i te mea ko te haere i roto i te huka he hoihoi mō te hunga ka pāngia e tērā momo mate.

translations.source_text: Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).
translations.pred_target_text: Ko nga haerenga o Saint Petersburg ko te waa ki te taone nui. Ka whakakorehia nga kaihihi teretere i nga whakaritenga uruwhenua (tirohia nga tikanga).
translations.true_target_text: Kei roto i ngā rerenga Saint Petersburg he wā ki rō tāone. Kei te wātea ngā pāhihi rerenga i ngā herenga pane uruwhenua (tirohia ngā herenga).

translations.source_text: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find.
translations.pred_target_text: He maha nga mahi a nga casino ki te whakanui i nga wa me nga moni e pau ana e nga manuhiri. I te nuinga o te wa ka ngaro nga matapihi me nga karaka, a he uaua ki te kitea nga putanga.
translations.true_target_text: I ētahi wā ka whakapau kaha ngā whare petipeti kia nui ake ai te wā me te moni e whakapaungia ana e ngā manuhiri. I te nuinga o te wā kāore i te kitea ngā wini, ngā karaka rānei, ā, he uaua te kitea o ngā putanga.

translations.source_text: They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise.
translations.pred_target_text: I te nuinga o te wa he kai motuhake ta ratou, inu me nga mahi whakangahau, hei pupuri i nga manuhiri i roto i te ahua pai, me te pupuri i a raatau ki te waahi.
translations.true_target_text: I te nuinga o te wā he ratonga kai, inu, whakangahau motuhake, kia noho hari tonu ngā manuhiri, kia noho tonu rātou ki te whare.

translations.source_text: Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko etahi waahi ka tuku inu waipiro ki runga i te whare. Heoi, ko te haurangi ka paheke te whakawakanga, ka mohio nga kaipetipeti pai katoa ki te hiranga o te noho marie.
translations.true_target_text: Tērā ētahi hingonga ka koha atu i te inu waipiro. Heoi, ka riro te tangata i roto i tana haurangi, kei te mōhio hoki ngā kaipetipeti toa ki te hirahiratanga o te noho haurangi kore.

translations.source_text: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te tangata e haere ana ki te taraiwa i nga ahopae teitei, i runga ranei i nga huarahi maunga, me whakaaro te ahua o te hukarere, te hukapapa, te makariri ranei.
translations.true_target_text: Me whai whakaaro te tangata ka taraiwa ake ki ngā ahopae teitei, ki ngā tarahanga maunga rānei kei pā pea te hukarere, te tio, ngā paemahana tino makariri rānei.

translations.source_text: On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt.
translations.pred_target_text: I runga i nga huarahi tio me te hukarere, he iti te waku, kare e taea e koe te taraiwa me te mea kei runga koe i te parapara.
translations.true_target_text: Ki ngā huarahi tio, hukapapa hoki, he iti te pane uruwhenua, ā, e kore e taea e koe te taraiwa anō nei kei te raima kau koe.

translations.source_text: During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time.
translations.pred_target_text: I te wa o te awhiowhio, he nui te hukarere e mau ai koe ka taka i roto i te wa poto.
translations.true_target_text: I ngā huka kairākau, ka tau pea te nui o ngā huka kia mau koe i te wā poto rawa.

translations.source_text: Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows.
translations.pred_target_text: Ka taea hoki te aukati i te tirohanga ma te taka, ma te pupuhi hukarere ranei, ma te tohe, te hukapapa ranei i runga i nga matapihi waka.
translations.true_target_text: Ka whakawhāititia hoki pea te ari e te huka rere, te huka pupuhi rānei, e te tōtā, te tio rānei ki ngā matapihi o te waka.

translations.source_text: On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.
translations.pred_target_text: I tetahi atu taha, he ahua noa te ahua o te hukapapa me te hukarere i roto i nga whenua maha, a ka haere tonu nga waka i te nuinga o te tau.
translations.true_target_text: Ki tērā atu taha, he noa ngā āhuatanga tio, hukapapa hoki ki ngā tini whenua, ā, ka haere tonu te ikiiki kāore he tino raru puta noa i te tau.

translations.source_text: Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko Safaris pea te mahinga tuuruhi nui rawa atu i Awherika me te mea nui mo nga manuhiri maha.
translations.true_target_text: Ākuanei pea ko ngā Safari ngā tino mahinga tūruhi ki Awherika me te tīno mahinga mō te tini o ngā tūruhi.

translations.source_text: The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te kupu safari e whakamahia nuitia ana e pa ana ki te haerenga ki uta ki te mataki i nga kararehe mohoao o Awherika, otira ki te savanna.
translations.true_target_text: Ko te kupu safari e whakamahi whanuingia ana hei āhuatanga haerere ki uta ki tai ki te titiro ki ngā kararehe mohoao o Awherika, inā koā ki te wāhanga Savanna.

translations.source_text: Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko etahi o nga kararehe, penei i nga arewhana me nga giraffe, ka tata ki nga motuka me nga taputapu paerewa ka pai te tirohanga.
translations.true_target_text: Ētahi kararehe pēnei i ngā arewhana me ngā Hirāwhe ka whakatata atu i ētahi wā ki ngā motokā, ā, mā te taputapu ngāwari noa e whai wāhi atu ai ki te tirohanga papai.

translations.source_text: Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars.
translations.pred_target_text: I etahi wa ka whakama te raiona, cheetahs me te reparo, ka kite koe i a raatau ma te karu.
translations.true_target_text: Ka whakamā i ētahi wā ngā raiona, ngā tīta, ngā rēpara hoki, ā, ka pai ake tō kite i a rātou ki ngā karu whakatata.

translations.source_text: A walking safari (also called a "bush walk", "hiking safari", or going "footing") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days.
translations.pred_target_text: He hīkoi hīkoi (e kīia ana he "haere ngahere", "hīkoi safari", he "waewae") he hikoi, mo etahi haora, mo etahi ra ranei.
translations.true_target_text: Ko tētahi safari hīkoi (e kīia ana hoki tētahi "hīkoi ngahere", "safari takahi whenua", te haere "mā raro" rānei) ko te hīkoi, mō ētahi hāora, ētahi rangi rānei.

translations.source_text: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan.
translations.pred_target_text: Ka tu nga Paralympics mai i te 24 o Akuhata ki te 5 o Mahuru 2021. Ka tu etahi huihuinga ki etahi atu waahi puta noa i Hapani.
translations.true_target_text: Ka tū Ngā Taumāhekeheke o te Ao mō te Hunga Pararūtiki atu i te 24 o Ākuhata ki te 5 o Hepetema hei te tau 2021. Ka tū ētahi o ngā mahi ki wāhi kē atu puta noa i Hapani.

translations.source_text: Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko Tokyo anake te taone nui o Ahia kua whakahaere i nga whakataetae Olympics i te raumati, i te tau 1964 i whakahaere nga whakataetae.
translations.true_target_text: Ka tū a Tokyo hei tāone nui kotahi nō Āhia kia manaaki i ngā Taumāhekeheke o te Ao ā-raumati e rua, i runga i tana manaaki i ngā taumāhekeheke i te tau 1964.

translations.source_text: If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation.
translations.pred_target_text: Mena kua tohua e koe o rerenga me to kaainga mo te tau 2020 i mua i te panuitanga o te hiki, ka raru pea koe.
translations.true_target_text: Mēnā i hoko koe i ō rerenga, i tō whare noho mō te tau 2020 i mua i te whakapuakitanga o te takaroatanga, ka raru pea.

translations.source_text: Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled.
translations.pred_target_text: He rereke nga kaupapa here whakakore, engari i te mutunga o Poutu-te-rangi ko te nuinga o nga kaupapa here whakakore-a-coronavirus kaore e tae ki te Hurae 2020, i te wa i whakaritea ai nga Olympics.
translations.true_target_text: Ka rerekē ngā kaupapa here whakakore, ēngari i te mutunga o te Māihe ko te nuinga o ngā kaupapa here whakakorenga huaketo kāore i toro ki te Hurae 2020, i te wā i whakaritea mai ai ngā kēmu taumāhekeheke o te ao.

translations.source_text: It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te whakaaro ko te nuinga o nga tikiti huihuinga ka utu i waenga i te ¥2,500 me te ¥130,000, me nga tikiti angamaheni kei te ¥7,000 te utu.
translations.true_target_text: Ka whakaarotia ko te utu o te nuinga o ngā tīkiti whakaaturanga kei waenganui i te 2,500 yen me te 130,000 yen, ā, ko ngā tīkiti whānui he tata ki te 7,000 yen.

translations.source_text: Ironing damp clothes can help them dry. Many hotels have an iron and ironing board available for loan, even if one is not present in the room.
translations.pred_target_text: Ma te rino i nga kakahu makuku ka awhina i a ratou kia maroke. He maha nga hotera he rino me te papa rino e waatea ana mo te nama, ahakoa kaore tetahi i roto i te ruma.
translations.true_target_text: Mā te haeana kākahu mākū e āwhina pea te whakamaroke. He maha ngā hōtēra whai haeana me te papa haeana e wātea ana ki te whakamahi, ahakoa kāore tētahi ki te ruma.

translations.source_text: If an iron isn't available, or if you don't fancy wearing ironed socks, then you can try using a hairdryer, if available.
translations.pred_target_text: Mena karekau he rino, karekau ranei koe e pai ki te mau toka rino, katahi ka taea e koe te whakamahi i te whakamaroke makawe, mena e waatea ana.
translations.true_target_text: Ki te kore he aiana, ki te kore rānei koe e pai ki te mau i ngā tōkena iana, tēnā, e taea nei te whakamahi i tētahi mihini whakamaroke makawe mēnā kei reira tētahi.

translations.source_text: Be careful not to allow fabric to become too hot (which can cause shrinkage, or in extreme cases, scorch).
translations.pred_target_text: Kia tupato kei wera rawa te papanga (ka paheke, ka wera ranei).
translations.true_target_text: Kia tūpato kia kaua e tuku i te kākahu kia wera rawa (mā korā pea e pīngongo, i ētahi wā kino ka hunuhunutia rānei).

translations.source_text: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats.
translations.pred_target_text: He rereke nga huarahi mo te horoi i te wai, ko etahi ka whai hua ki nga riri motuhake.
translations.true_target_text: He ara rerekē hei whakamā i te wai, ka pai ake ētahi ki ētahi whakatuma ake.

translations.source_text: In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed.
translations.pred_target_text: I etahi waahi ka nui te wai kohua mo te meneti, i etahi atu ka hiahiatia etahi meneti.
translations.true_target_text: I ētahi wāhi he nawhe te koropupū i te wai mō te kotahi miniti, i ētahi atu wāhi me nui atu ngā miniti.

translations.source_text: Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.
translations.pred_target_text: He rereke te whaihua o nga whiriwhiringa, a mena kei te awangawanga koe, me whakaaro koe ki te hoko i to wai i roto i te pounamu hiri mai i tetahi kamupene rongonui.
translations.true_target_text: Ka rerekē te painga o ngā tātari, ā, mehemea he āwangawanga tāu, me whai whakaaro koe ki te hoko i tō wai ki tētahi pātara kua kōpanitia mai i tētahi kamupene e mōhiotia ana.

translations.source_text: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions.
translations.pred_target_text: Ka tupono pea te hunga haere ki nga riha kararehe kaore i te mohio ki o raatau rohe.
translations.true_target_text: Ka kite pea te hunga hāereere i ngā riha kararehe kāore i te waia ki ēnei ki ō rātou wā kāinga.

translations.source_text: Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections.
translations.pred_target_text: Ka taea e nga riha te pahua i te kai, ka whakapataritari, ki te kino rawa atu ranei ka puta he mate mate mate, ka horapa te wea, ka tuku mate ranei.
translations.true_target_text: Ka taea e ngā riha te whakapirau kai, te whakaputa hīrawerawe, ā, ko te mea kino rawa ka whakaputa mate tāwera, te whakawhānui paitini, te tuku poke rānei.

translations.source_text: Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko nga mate hopuhopu ake, ko nga kararehe morearea ranei ka whara, ka whakamate ranei i nga tangata ma te kaha, kaore e kiia he riha.
translations.true_target_text: Ko ngā mate hōrapa ake, ko ngā kararehe mōrearea rānei ka taea te whara, te whakamate rānei i te tangata mā te tōpana, i te nuinga o te wā kāore i te kīia he kīrearea.

translations.source_text: Duty free shopping is the opportunity to buy goods exempted from taxes and excises at certain locations.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te hokohoko kore utu ko te whai waahi ki te hoko taonga karekau i nga taake me nga taake i etahi waahi.
translations.true_target_text: Ko te hokohoko tāke kore he ara hei hoko i ngā rawa karekau he here ki te tāka e mahia ana ki ētahi wāhi motuhake.

translations.source_text: Travellers bound for countries with heavy taxation can sometimes save a considerable amount of money, especially on products such as alcoholic beverages and tobacco.
translations.pred_target_text: Ka taea e te hunga haere haere ki nga whenua he nui te taake e penapena moni ana i etahi wa, ina koa mo nga hua penei i te inu waipiro me te tupeka.
translations.true_target_text: I ētahi wā e āhei ai te hunga hāereere ki ngā motu he nui te tāke kia whakaemi i ētahi moni nui, ā, e pēnei ana hoki mō ngā taputapu pēnei i ngā inu waipiro me ngā tupeka anō hoki.

translations.source_text: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te toronga i waenga i Point Marion me Fairmont e whakaatu ana i nga ahuatanga taraiwa tino wero i te huarahi nui o Buffalo-Pittsburgh, e haere ana ma nga whenua tuawhenua taratahi.
translations.true_target_text: Ko te wāhanga i waenganui i Point Marion me Fairmont kei te whakatū i ngā āhuatanga taraiwa uaua rawa ki te Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, he rite tonu te haere mā ngā whenua wao mohoao.

translations.source_text: If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate.
translations.pred_target_text: Ki te kore koe e waia ki te taraiwa i runga i nga rori whenua, kia mau tonu to whakaaro ki a koe: ko nga tohu teitei, nga huarahi whaiti, me nga pihi koi.
translations.true_target_text: Ki te kore koe e waia ana ki te taraiwa ki ngā huarahi taiwhenua, kia mataara tonu koe: he nui ngā paripari, ngā huarahi whāiti, me ngā kokonga koki tāhapa.

translations.source_text: Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise.
translations.pred_target_text: He iti ake nga tepe tere i tuhia i nga waahanga o mua me nga waahanga o muri mai - ko te nuinga o te 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) - he mea nui ake te whakarongo ki a raatau.
translations.true_target_text: He iti iho ngā here tere e tohua ana i ērā ki ngā wāhanga o mua, o muri anō hoki - he nui te wā ko te 35-40 m/h (56-64 km/h), - ā, he mea hira rawa te tino whai i ēnei i ērā atu.

translations.source_text: Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te mea miharo, he kaha ake te ratonga waea pūkoro i konei i te maha atu o nga huarahi o te huarahi, penei i te Pennsylvania Wilds.
translations.true_target_text: He mea māhirahira, he kaha ake te ratonga waea pūkoro ki konei i ērā atu roanga o te huarahi, hei tauira ngā Pennsylvania Wilds.

translations.source_text: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria.
translations.pred_target_text: He tino pai nga keke Tiamana, a, i Bavaria, he tino taonga, he rereke, he rite ki nga mea o to ratou hoa tata ki te tonga, Austria.
translations.true_target_text: He āhua reka ngā parāoa Tiamani, ā, ki Bavaria, he āhua mōmona, he nui ngā momo, pērā i ērā o tā rātou whenua tata ki te tonga, o Ateria.

translations.source_text: Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer.
translations.pred_target_text: He mea noa nga poi huarākau, me te aporo ka tunua hei pōhā huri noa i te tau, me te here me te paramu ka puta i te raumati.
translations.true_target_text: E kitea noatia ana ngā tāte huarākau, arā ka tunua ngā āporo ki ngā tāte puta noa i te tau, ā, ka kitea ngā tiere, ngā paramu i te wā o te raumati.

translations.source_text: Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee.
translations.pred_target_text: He maha nga taonga tunua Tiamana he aramona, hazelnuts me etahi atu nati rakau. He pai te hono o nga keke rongonui ki te kapu kawhe kaha.
translations.true_target_text: Kei ngā tini tunumanga parāoa Tiamani he aramona, he hānati, he nati rākau atu anō hoki. He tino pai te kai tahi i ngā keke rorotu ki tētahi kapu kawhe hūnene.

translations.source_text: If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.
translations.pred_target_text: Mena kei te pirangi koe ki etahi keke iti ahakoa whai kiko, whakamatauhia nga mea i runga i te rohe e kiia nei ko Berliner, Pfannkuchen, Krapfen ranei.
translations.true_target_text: Me kei te hiahia koe i ētahi paoa rekareka iti nei, taraingia te aha e ai ki te rohe kua ingoa Berliner, Pfannkuchen, Krapfen rānei.

translations.source_text: A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te kari he kai mai i nga otaota me nga mea kakara, me nga kai me nga huawhenua.
translations.true_target_text: Ko te kai kari tētahi kai kua whakaritea ki ngā otaota, ki ngā rau kikini, tahi ki te mīti, te huawhenua rānei.

translations.source_text: A curry can be either "dry" or "wet" depending on the amount of liquid.
translations.pred_target_text: Ka taea te "maroke" me te "makuku" te kari i runga i te nui o te wai.
translations.true_target_text: He "maroke", he "mākū" rānei tētahi kari i runga i te nui o te wē.

translations.source_text: In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used.
translations.pred_target_text: I nga rohe tuawhenua o Inia ki te Raki me Pakistan, ka whakamahia te miraka pē ki roto i nga pihi; i te tonga o Inia me etahi atu rohe takutai o te motu, ka whakamahia te waiu kokonati.
translations.true_target_text: Ki ngā rohe tuawhenua o Īnia ki te Raki, o Pakitāne, kei te whakamahia whānuitia te miraka tepe ki ngā kari; ki Īnia ki te Tonga, ki ētahi atu takiwā ki tai o te paparahi āpiti, kei te whakamahia whānuitia te miraka kokonati.

translations.source_text: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation.
translations.pred_target_text: Ma te 17,000 nga moutere hei whiriwhiri mai, ko te kai a Indonesia he kupu whakamarumaru e kapi ana i te tini o nga momo kai a-rohe ka kitea puta noa i te motu.
translations.true_target_text: I roto i te 17,000 ngā motu hei kōwhiringa, ko te kai Indonesia hei āhuatanga hamarara e whakakapi nei i te tini i ngā kai taketake ā-rohe e horapa ana i te whenua.

translations.source_text: But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java.
translations.pred_target_text: Engari, ki te whakamahia kaore he tohu tohu, ko te tikanga ko te kai i ahu mai i te puku me te rawhiti o te motu nui o Java.
translations.true_target_text: Heoi anō, mehemea ka whakamahia karekau ngā kupu anō, ko te tino tikanga o te kupu ko te kai i ahu mai i ngā wāhi waenga, tawhiti hoki o te motu matua o Java.

translations.source_text: Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.
translations.pred_target_text: Inaianei kei te waatea puta noa i te motu, ko nga kai Javanese he maha nga momo kai kua tau, ko nga mea kakara e paingia ana e te iwi Java ko te pīnati, te tiihi, te huka (ina koa te huka kokonati Javanese) me nga momo kakara kakara.
translations.true_target_text: Ināianei kei te wātea mai ngā momo kai Javanese puta noa i te huinga motu, ā, kei a ia te whānuitanga o ngā kai he māmā noa te hā, ā, ko ngā hā matua he pai ki te hunga Javanese ko te pīnati, te hiri, te huka (inarā ko te huka kokonati Javanese), me ngā tini rau kikini whakakakara.

translations.source_text: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle.
translations.pred_target_text: He poutoko mo nga waewae o te kaieke e iri ana ki tetahi taha o te nohoanga.
translations.true_target_text: He mea tautoko ngā tarapu mō ngā waewae o te kaieke ka tau ki raro ki ngā taha e rua o te tera.

translations.source_text: They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them.
translations.pred_target_text: Ka nui ake te pumau mo te kaieke engari he awangawanga haumaru na te mea ka mau nga waewae o te kaieke ki roto.
translations.true_target_text: Ka hoatu rātou he tiakitanga pai ake mō te kaieke ēngari he āwangawangatanga tonu mō te haumarutanga i te mea o ngā waewae o te kaieke kei mau.

translations.source_text: If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken.
translations.pred_target_text: Mena ka makahia te kaieke mai i te hoiho engari ka mau te waewae ki te porowhita, ka toia mai mena ka oma te hoiho. Hei whakaiti i tenei raru, he maha nga tikanga haumaru ka taea te mahi.
translations.true_target_text: Ki te whiua tētahi kaieke i tētahi hōiho engari kua mau te waewae ki te tarapu, ka tōngia pea mēnā ka oma ake te hōiho. Hei whakaiti rawa i tēnei mōrearea, ka taea ētahi tūpatotanga haumaru.

translations.source_text: First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole.
translations.pred_target_text: Tuatahi, ko te nuinga o nga kaieke e mau putu eke ana me te rekereke me te maeneene, tino whaiti, te turanga.
translations.true_target_text: Mātua, ko te nuinga o ngā kaieke ka mau pūtu tika pōtae tika me ngā mau rekereke tika, me te kuiti māeneene whāiti nei.

translations.source_text: Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.
translations.pred_target_text: Whai muri, ko etahi o nga nohoanga, otira ko nga nohoanga pakeha, he tutaki whakamarumaru e taea ai te taka te hiako porowhita mai i te nohoanga mena ka toia whakamuri e te kaieke ka hinga.
translations.true_target_text: E whai ake nei ko ētahi terapēke, inarā ko ngā terapēke Ingarihi, he pā marutau ōna e āhei ai te tarapu kirikau te taka i te terapēke mēnā kua tōia whakamuritia e tētahi kai eke e taka ana.

translations.source_text: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags.
translations.pred_target_text: Raorao o Cochamó - Ko te waahi pikinga tuatahi o Chile, e mohiotia ana ko te Yosemite o Amerika ki te Tonga, me nga momo papapa nunui me nga pari kohatu.
translations.true_target_text: Te Taiororua o Cochamō - Te wāhi whakaeke kounga rawa o Hiri, e mōhiotia ana ko te Yosemite o Amerika ki te Tonga, me ana momo pakitara me ngā kōhatu tokapata nunui.

translations.source_text: Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.
translations.pred_target_text: Kei roto i nga tihi nga tirohanga mai i nga tihi. Ko nga kaikoeke mai i nga waahi katoa o te ao kei te hanga huarahi hou ki waenga i te kaha mutunga kore o nga pakitara.
translations.true_target_text: Kei roto i te piki ki ngā tihi ko ngā tirohanga mīharo i ngā tihi. Kei te whakatūtū tonu ngā kaipiki mai i ngā tōpito katoa o te ao i ngā ara hou ki ōna pakitara mutunga kore.

translations.source_text: Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko nga hakinakina hukapapa whakaheke, ko te reti retihuka me te papa hukarere, he hakinakina rongonui e paheke ana ki raro i nga whenua kua taupokina e te hukarere me nga reeti, he papa hukarere ranei e piri ana ki o waewae.
translations.true_target_text: Ko ngā hākinakina heke haere, kei roto rā ko te retireti me te eke papa hukapapa, he hākinakina makau ko te mahi ko te rere iho i te whenua e kapia ana ki te hukapapa ki ngā retireti, ki tētahi papa hukapapa rānei e tūhonotia ana ki ō waeawae.

translations.source_text: Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as "ski bums," planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te hikareti he mahi haere nui me te maha o nga kaingākau, e kiia nei he "pekepeke," ka whakamahere i nga hararei katoa mo te reti retihuka i tetahi waahi.
translations.true_target_text: He hanga haerere te retireti me ngā tini tāngata hikaka, e mōhiotia whānuitia ki te "reti nono", te whakarite i ngā hararei reti i tētahi wāhi motuhake.

translations.source_text: The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC!
translations.pred_target_text: He tawhito rawa te whakaaro mo te reti retihue — ko nga peita ana e whakaatu ana i nga kaireti reeke no te 5000 BC!
translations.true_target_text: He tawhito rawa te ariā o te eke rēti - kei te kitea he toi ana e whakaatu ana i ngā kaieke rēti mai rā anō i te 5000 BC!

translations.source_text: Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia.
translations.pred_target_text: Ka hoki mai ano te reti retihuka hei hakinakina ki te rautau 17 pea, a i te tau 1861 ka whakatuwherahia te karapu reti reti tuatahi e nga Norewani i Ahitereiria.
translations.true_target_text: Mai i te rautau tua 17, neke atu rānei, te whakaretireti whakaheke hei hākinakina, ā, i te tau 1861 i whakatuwheratia te karapu retireti tuatahi e ētahi tāngata nō Nōwei ki Ahitereiria.

translations.source_text: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking.
translations.pred_target_text: Te pekepeke ma te retireti: Ka kiia hoki tenei mahi he reiki tuawhenua, he haerenga reti reti, he hikoi reti ranei.
translations.true_target_text: Paketeke mā te retihuka: ko tēnei mahinga e kī ana hoki ko te reti reti i ngā whenua o muri, ko te reti tūruhi, ko te reti hīkoinga rānei.

translations.source_text: It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots.
translations.pred_target_text: E pa ana ki engari ko te nuinga o te waa kaore e uru ki nga haerenga hiwi me te eke maunga, ko nga mea o muri ka mahia ki nga whenua pari, me te hiahia kia kaha ake nga reeti me nga putu.
translations.true_target_text: E hāngai ana ki te haere retireti āhua maunga, te piki maunga rānei, engari i te nuinga o te wā kāore i te whai wāhi ēnei, ko ēnei e mahia ana ki ngā wāhi paripari, ā, ka hiahiatia ngā reti me ngā pūtu māro ake.

translations.source_text: Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route.
translations.pred_target_text: Whakaarohia te huarahi hikareti he rite ki te huarahi hikoi.
translations.true_target_text: Whakaarohia te ara retireti hei ara hīkoi ōrite.

translations.source_text: In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.
translations.pred_target_text: I roto i nga ahuatanga pai ka taea e koe te hipoki i nga tawhiti nui atu i te hikoi - engari he iti noa iho ka eke koe ki te tere o te reti reti whenua me te kore he peke tuara taumaha i nga huarahi whakapaipai.
translations.true_target_text: I roto i ngā āhuatanga papai ka roa ake ngā roanga ka taea e koe i tā te hīkoi - heoi i ētahi wā iti nei ka tae rawa koe ki te terenga o te retireti hīkoi hukapapa mēnā horekau tētahi pīkau taumaha ki ngā ara kua whakaritea.

translations.source_text: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times.
translations.pred_target_text: He whenua iti a Europe engari he maha nga whenua motuhake. I raro i nga ahuatanga noa, ko te haere i roto i nga whenua maha ko te tikanga me uru ki nga tono uruwhenua me te mana uruwhenua i nga wa maha.
translations.true_target_text: He iti noa nei te whenua whānui a Ūropi engari he nui ngā iwi motuhake kei reira. Ko tōna āhua, ko te karore i ngā whenua huhua he nui ngā wā me whakamātauria ngā pane uruwhenua e uru ai ki aua whenua rā.

translations.source_text: The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te rohe Schengen, engari, he ahua rite ki tetahi whenua mo tenei kaupapa.
translations.true_target_text: Heoi anō, he āhua pērā i tētahi whenua te Schengen zone, mō tēnei āhuatanga.

translations.source_text: As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again.
translations.pred_target_text: I te wa e noho ana koe ki tenei rohe, ka taea e koe te whakawhiti i nga rohe me te kore e haere ano i nga waahi tirotiro uruwhenua.
translations.true_target_text: I a koe ka noho ki tēnei rohe, ka taea e koe te whakawhiti i ngā rohe, ā, ehara i te mea me haere anō mā ngā tirotiro kaitiaki uruwhenua.

translations.source_text: Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.
translations.pred_target_text: Waihoki, ma te whai visa Schengen, kaore koe e hiahia ki te tono uruwhenua ki ia o nga whenua mema Schengen motuhake, no reira ka penapena te wa, te moni me nga mahi pepa.
translations.true_target_text: Me te mea hoki, mā te mau i tētahi visa Schengen me tono motuhake koe mō ngā visas kei ia o ngā whenua mema Schengen, ā, koira e maha ake te wā, te moni me ngā pepamahi.

translations.source_text: There is no universal definition for which manufactured items are antiques. Some tax agencies define goods older than 100 years as antiques.
translations.pred_target_text: Karekau he whakamaramatanga o te ao mo nga mea hanga he mea tawhito. Ko etahi o nga tari taake e whakatau ana i nga taonga tawhito ake i te 100 tau hei taonga tawhito.
translations.true_target_text: Kāore he mōhiotanga whānui hei tautohu i ngā taputapu hei taputapu nō tua whakarere. Ētahi kaiwhakahaere tāki ka tautohu i ngā taputapu nō tua whakarere mēnā e nui atu i te 100 tau te tawhito.

translations.source_text: The definition has geographic variations, where the age limit might be shorter in places such as North America than in Europe.
translations.pred_target_text: He rereketanga matawhenua te whakamaramatanga, he iti ake pea te tepe o te tau ki nga waahi penei i Amerika Te Taitokerau i Uropi.
translations.true_target_text: He rerekē ā-matawhenua nei ngā whakamāramatanga, ka rerekē pea te tau ngā tau kei ngā whenua, pērā ki Te Raki o Amerika me Ūropi.

translations.source_text: Handicraft products might be defined as antiques, though they are younger than similar mass-produced goods.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko nga taonga toi a-ringa ka kiia he taonga tawhito, ahakoa he iti ake i nga taonga hanga papatipu rite.
translations.true_target_text: Ko ngā rawa mahi-a-ringa ka kīa he tāonga nō uki, he ahakoa i hangaia i muri i ētahi tāonga kua whakaputaina nuitia.

translations.source_text: Reindeer husbandry is an important livelihood among the Sámi and the culture surrounding the trade is important also for many with other professions.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te mahi ahuwhenua renitia he oranga nui i waenga i nga Sámi me te ahurea e karapoti ana i te tauhokohoko he mea nui ano hoki mo te maha o era atu umanga.
translations.true_target_text: He hirahira te pāmu renetia mō te oranga o te Sāmi, ā, ko te ahurea e hāngai ana ki te hohoko he hirahira ki ngā umanga maha.

translations.source_text: Even traditionally, though, not all Sámi have been involved in big scale reindeer husbandry, but lived from fishing, hunting and similar, having reindeer mostly as draft animals.
translations.pred_target_text: Ahakoa i nga wa o mua, kaore nga Sámi katoa i uru ki nga mahi ahuwhenua nui, engari i noho mai i te hii ika, te hopu me nga mea pera, ko te nuinga o nga renitia he kararehe tarai.
translations.true_target_text: Ahakoa i ngā wā o mua, kāore ngā Sāmi katoa i whai wāhi ki te mahi pāmu nui i ngā renetia, ēngari i ora nā te hī ika, nā te aru, nā ngā mahi pēnei, ko te renetia i whakamahia hei kararehe mahi i te nuinga o te wā.

translations.source_text: Today many Sámi work in modern trades. Tourism is an important income in Sápmi, the Sámi area.
translations.pred_target_text: I tenei ra he maha nga Sámi e mahi ana i nga mahi hokohoko hou. He moni nui te mahi tuuruhi ki Sápmi, te rohe o Sámi.
translations.true_target_text: I ēnei rā nei he nui ngā Sāmi e mahi ana i ngā mahi o ēnei wā nei. Ka nui te moni e ahu mai ana i ngā mahi tūruhi i Sāpmi, te wāhi o Sāmi.

translations.source_text: Though it is widely used, especially among non-Romani, the word "Gypsy" is often considered offensive because of its associations with negative stereotypes and inaccurate perceptions of Romani people.
translations.pred_target_text: Ahakoa e whakamahia nuitia ana, ina koa i waenga i nga tangata ehara i te Romani, ko te kupu "Gypsy" he maha nga wa e kiia ana he kino na te mea ko ona hononga ki nga ahuatanga kino me nga whakaaro kore tika o nga tangata Romani.
translations.true_target_text: He ahakoa e horapa ana te whakamahinga, inarā i waenganui i te hunga ehara i te Romani, e whai whakaarotia te kupu "Gypsy" hei kupu kino i te nuinga o te wā nā tana hononga ki te whakaaro horapa kino me ngā whakaaro hē mō ngā tāngata Romani.

translations.source_text: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected.
translations.pred_target_text: Mena ka uru te whenua ka haere koe ki raro i tetahi tohutohu haerenga, ka raru pea to inihua hauora haere, to inihua whakakore haerenga ranei.
translations.true_target_text: Mehemea ka pā tētahi tohu hāereere ki te whenua e torohia ana e koe, ka pāngia pea tō inihua hauora hāereere, tō inihua whakakore haerenga rānei.

translations.source_text: You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens.
translations.pred_target_text: Ka hiahia pea koe ki te toro atu ki nga tohutohu a nga kawanatanga ke atu i a koe ake, engari ko o raatau tohutohu he mea whakarite mo o raatau tangata whenua.
translations.true_target_text: Ka hiahia hoki pea koe ki te aro atu ki ngā tohutohu o ngā kāwanatanga atu i tō ake, engari kei te hoahoatia ō rātou tohutohu mō te hunga nō tō rātou whenua ake.

translations.source_text: As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs.
translations.pred_target_text: Hei tauira, ko nga taangata Amerika kei te Rawhiti Rawhiti ka pa ki nga ahuatanga rereke mai i nga Pakeha me nga Arapi.
translations.true_target_text: Hei tētahi tauira, ka aro atu pea ngā kainoho nō Amerika ki te Rāwhiti Waenga i ngā āhuatanga rerekē i te hunga nō Ūropi, i ngā Arapa rānei.

translations.source_text: Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country.
translations.pred_target_text: He whakarāpopototanga poto noa iho ngā tohutohu mō ngā āhuatanga tōrangapū i tētahi whenua.
translations.true_target_text: Ko ngā kaitohutohu he kōrero whakarāpopoto noa mō ngā āhuatanga tōrangapū o te whenua kotahi.

translations.source_text: The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko nga tirohanga e whakaatuhia ana he poto noa, he whanui me te tino ngawari ki te whakataurite ki nga korero e waatea ana ki etahi atu waahi.
translations.true_target_text: Ko ngā whakaaro he wairua whakahāwea, he whakaaro whānui rawa, kāore i te hōhonu, kāore i te whāiti te titiro.

translations.source_text: Severe weather is the generic term for any dangerous weather phenomenon with the potential to cause damage, serious social disruption, or loss of human life.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te huarere kino te kupu whanui mo nga ahuatanga huarere kino ka pa mai te kino, te rarunga hapori nui, te mate tangata ranei.
translations.true_target_text: Ko te huarere kino ko te rerenga noa mō tētahi āhuatanga huarere mōrearea ka whakaritea pea e ia te kino, te whakararu papori nui, te matenga rānei o te tangata.

translations.source_text: Severe weather can occur anywhere in the world, and there are different types of it, which can depend on geography, topography, and atmospheric conditions.
translations.pred_target_text: Ka puta te kino o te rangi ki nga waahi katoa o te ao, a, he rereke nga momo, ka whakawhirinaki ki te matawhenua, te whenua, me nga ahuatanga o te hau.
translations.true_target_text: Ka taea te huarere kino te puta mai ki ngā wāhi katoa o te ao, ā, he maha ngā momo rerekē, ka hāngai pea ki te takotoranga papa, te takoto whenua, me ngā āhuatanga kōhauhau.

translations.source_text: High winds, hail, excessive precipitation, and wildfires are forms and effects of severe weather, as are thunderstorms, tornadoes, waterspouts, and cyclones.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko nga hau nui, te whatu, te ua nui, me te ahi ahi he ahua me nga hua o te kino o te rangi, pera ano nga whatitiri, awhiowhio, nga pupuhi wai, me nga awhiowhio.
translations.true_target_text: Ko ngā hau kaha, ko te hukawaitara, ko te ua nui rawa, ko ngā ahi tarakaka ētahi āhua, ētahi pānga o te huarere kino, pērā anō hoki i ngā rautupu, i ngā āwhiowhio, i ngā puahiritanga, i ngā haumātakataka anō hoki.

translations.source_text: Regional and seasonal severe weather phenomena include blizzards, snowstorms, ice storms, and dust storms.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko nga ahuatanga huarere kino o te rohe me te kaupeka ko te awhiowhio, te awha hukarere, te awha hukapapa, me te awha puehu.
translations.true_target_text: Ko ngā āhuatanga huarere kino ā-rohe, ā-kaupeka hoki ko ngā huka kairākau, ko ngā ua puahiri, ko ngā paroro tio me ngā paroro kōnehu.

translations.source_text: Travellers are strongly advised to be aware of any risk of severe weather affecting their area as they may affect any travel plans.
translations.pred_target_text: Ka tino tohutohuhia nga kaihaerere kia tupato ki nga raru o te huarere kino ka pa ki o raatau rohe na te mea ka pa ki nga mahere haerenga.
translations.true_target_text: E tīno akiaki ana i ngā tūruhi kia matāra ai rātou i ngā tūraru marangai kei whakararu i tō rātou wāhi i roto anō hoki i te hanga nei ki te whakararu i te haerenga ahakoa te aha.

translations.source_text: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te tangata e whakamahere ana ki te haere ki tetahi whenua ka kiia he rohe whawhai me whiwhi whakangungu ngaio.
translations.true_target_text: Me whai whakangungu ngaio tētahi e whakamahere ana i te toronga atu ki tētahi whenua e whai whakaarohia ana he wāhi pakanga.

translations.source_text: A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company.
translations.pred_target_text: Ma te rapu i te Ipurangi mo te 'Akoranga taiao kino' tera pea ka kitea te wahitau o tetahi kamupene o te rohe.
translations.true_target_text: Mā te rapu i te ipurangi mo te "kōhi taiao kino" e kite ai i te wahi noho o tētahi kamupene ā-rohe.

translations.source_text: A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te tikanga ka kapi i te akoranga nga take katoa e korerohia ana i konei i roto i nga korero tino nui, ko te tikanga me nga wheako mahi.
translations.true_target_text: I te nuinga o te wā ka aro tētahi akomanga ki te katoa o ngā take e kōrerotia ana ki konei me te taipitopito nui ake, i te nuinga o te wā ki te wheako ā-ringa.

translations.source_text: A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te tikanga he 2-5 ra te roanga o te akoranga me te whai waahi ki te takaro, te nui o te awhina tuatahi me etahi wa whakangungu patu.
translations.true_target_text: I te nuinga o te wā i waenga i te 2-5 ngā rā te roa o tētahi wānanga, ā, he whakatau kei roto, he nui te āwhina tuatahi, ā, i ētahi wā he whakangungu rākau.

translations.source_text: Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.
translations.pred_target_text: He mea noa nga pukapuka me nga maheni e pa ana ki te oranga o te koraha, engari he iti noa nga pukapuka e pa ana ki nga rohe whawhai.
translations.true_target_text: He tini ngā pukapuka me ngā makahīni e kōrero ana mō te mōrehutanga ki te wao, heoi ehara i te mea he nui ngā putanga e pā ana ki ngā wāhi pakanga.

translations.source_text: Voyagers planning sex reassignment surgery abroad must ensure they're carrying valid documents for the return trip.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko nga kaiwhaiwhai e whakamahere ana i te pokanga wahine ki tawahi me whakarite kei te kawe i nga tuhinga whaimana mo te hokinga mai.
translations.true_target_text: Ko ngā hunga haere e whakamahere ana i te poka panoni ira kei tāwāhi me whakarite e kawe ana rātou i ngā puka whai mana mō te hokinga mai.

translations.source_text: The willingness of governments to issue passports with gender not stated (X) or documents updated to match a desired name and gender varies.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te hiahia o nga kawanatanga ki te tuku uruwhenua me te ira tangata kaore i te whakahuahia (X) me nga tuhinga kua whakahoutia kia rite ki te ingoa e hiahiatia ana me te ira tangata he rereke.
translations.true_target_text: Ko te hiahia o te kāwanatanga ki te tuku uruuruwhenua ki te kore e puakina te ira (X), ki ngā puka kua whakahoungia kia ōrite ki tētahi ingoa e hiahiatia ana, ira e hiahiatia ana rāne, ka rerekē tētahi i tētahi.

translations.source_text: Willingness of foreign governments to honour these documents is just as widely variable.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te hiahia o nga kawanatanga ke ki te whakanui i enei tuhinga he rerekee.
translations.true_target_text: Ko te hiahia a te kāwana manene ki whakahōnore i ēnei pukapuka, he rerekē noa atu hoki.

translations.source_text: Searches at security checkpoints have also become far more intrusive in the post-September 11, 2001 era.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko nga rapunga i nga waahi tirotiro haumaru kua tino kaha ake i muri i te 11 o Hepetema 2001.
translations.true_target_text: Kua manioro ake ngā whakatewhatewhanga i ngā tūngā a ngā kaiwhakahaumaru i te wā whai muri i te Hepetema 11, 2001.

translations.source_text: Pre-operative transgender people should not expect to pass through the scanners with their privacy and dignity intact.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko nga tangata whakawhiti ira i mua i te mahi kaore e tatari kia haere i roto i nga matawai me o raatau mana motuhake me o raatau mana.
translations.true_target_text: Ko te hunga irawhiti i mua i te hāparapara me kaua e pōhēhē ka puta i ngā matawai me te ū tonu o te noho matatapu me te mana.

translations.source_text: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te au riipee te hokinga mai o nga ngaru e pakaru mai ana i te takutai, i te nuinga o te waa ki te toka, ki te rite ranei.
translations.true_target_text: Ko ngā ia kauere te hokinga mai o ngā ngaru e tūātea ana i te takutai moana, i te nuinga o te wā kei ngā ākau, kei ngā mea pērā rānei.

translations.source_text: Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there.
translations.pred_target_text: Na te ahua o raro o te wai ka aro te rere o te hokinga ki etahi waahanga hohonu, a ka puta mai he ia tere ki te wai hohonu.
translations.true_target_text: I te takotoranga o te papa ki raro i te wai e pīhangaiti ana te pari auraki ki ngā wāhanga hohonu, ā, kei hua ake hoki tētahi pari tere ki te wai hōhonu ki reira.

translations.source_text: Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te nuinga o nga mate ka pa mai i te ngenge e ngana ana ki te kauhoe atu ki te au, kare pea e taea.
translations.true_target_text: Ko te nuinga o ngā mate ka ara ake i te ngenge i te wā e āki ana kia kaukau atu ki te au, i te mea akuanei pea he unuhanga taniwha tēnā.

translations.source_text: As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally.
translations.pred_target_text: Ka puta koe i te au o te au, karekau he uaua ake i te tikanga.
translations.true_target_text: Ka puta tonu atu koe i te ia, ko te kaukau kia hoki atu kāore e uaua ake i te kaukau i te nuinga o te wā.

translations.source_text: Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.
translations.pred_target_text: Ngana ki te whai ki tetahi waahi kaore koe e mau ano, i runga ranei i ou pukenga me te mea kua kitea koe, me tatari koe mo te whakaoranga.
translations.true_target_text: Ngana ki te aro atu ki tētahi wāhi kāore koe e mau anō, i runga rānei i ō pukenga, i tō kitea atu rānei, me tatari pea koe kia whakarauoratia.

translations.source_text: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te ohorere o te urunga mai ka tere ake i te ohorere o te ahurea (he iti ake te wahanga o te marama honi), ka roa ake, ka nui ake te kino.
translations.true_target_text: Ko te mauri rere o te kuhu anō ka tere ake te pā mai i tā te mauri rere ahurea (he iti iho te wā hanimuni), ka roa ake, ā, ka kino ake hoki pea.

translations.source_text: Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture.
translations.pred_target_text: I etahi wa ka uaua te hunga haere ki te huri ki te ahurea hou ki te whakatikatika ki o raatau tikanga taketake.
translations.true_target_text: Ko te hunga hāereere he māmā te urutau ki te ahurea hou, i ētahi wā he uaua tā rātou urutau anō ki tō rātou ahurea taketake.

translations.source_text: When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture.
translations.pred_target_text: I te hokinga mai ki te kainga i muri i to noho ki tawahi, kua urutau koe ki te ahurea hou, kua ngaro etahi o au tikanga mai i to tikanga o to kainga.
translations.true_target_text: Ka hoki mai ana koe ki te wā kāinga, kua whai ahurea hou koe, ā, kua ngaro i a koe ētahi o ngā tikanga o te kāinga.

translations.source_text: When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt.
translations.pred_target_text: I to haerenga ki tawahi i te tuatahi, he manawanui me te mohio te tangata, i te mohio me tahuri nga tangata haere ki tetahi whenua hou.
translations.true_target_text: I tō haerenga tuatahitanga ki tāwāhi, i te mānawanawa, i te āroharoha ngā tangata, i runga i te mōhio me urutau ngā tūruhi ki tētahi whenua hou.

translations.source_text: People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.
translations.pred_target_text: Kare pea te tangata e whakaaro he mea tika ano te manawanui me te mohio mo nga ratere e hoki ana ki te kainga.
translations.true_target_text: E kore pea ngā tāngata e whai whakaaro ake ko te manawa rau, ko te māramatanga he mea waiwai hoki mō te hunga hāereere e hoki ana ki te kāinga.

translations.source_text: The pyramid sound and light show is one of the most interesting things in the area for kids.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te oro tara me te whakaaturanga marama tetahi o nga mea whakamere i te takiwa mo nga tamariki.
translations.true_target_text: Ko te tangi oro me te whakaaturanga tīramarama tētahi o ngā mea hirahira katoa mō ngā tamariki.

translations.source_text: You can see the pyramids in the dark and you can see them in silence before the show begins.
translations.pred_target_text: Ka kite koe i nga koeko i roto i te pouri ka kite koe i a ratau i roto i te wahangu i mua i te tiimata o te whakaaturanga.
translations.true_target_text: Ka kitea ngā koeko ki te pōuri, ā, ka kitea i roto i te ngū i mua i te tīmatanga o te whakaaturanga.

translations.source_text: Usually you always here the sound of tourists and vendors. The story of the sound and light is just like a story book.
translations.pred_target_text: I te nuinga o te wa kei konei koe i te tangi o nga turuhi me nga kaihoko. Ko te korero o te tangi me te marama he rite tonu ki te pukapuka korero.
translations.true_target_text: I te nuinga o te wā ka rongo i te oro o ngā tūruhi me ngā kaihoko. Ko ngā paki e pā ana ki te oro me te rama he pēnei i tētahi puka paki.

translations.source_text: The Sphinx is set as the backdrop and the narrator of a long story.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te Sphinx te mea hei papamuri me te kaikorero mo tetahi korero roa.
translations.true_target_text: Ko te Sphnix ka noho hei tuarongo me te kaikōrero o tētahi paki tino roa.

translations.source_text: The scenes are displayed on the pyramids and the different pyramids are lit up.
translations.pred_target_text: Ka whakaatuhia nga ahuatanga ki runga i nga koeko, ka whakamaramahia nga rereke rereke.
translations.true_target_text: Kei te whakaaturia ngā mata ki ngā koeko, ā, kei te tūramatia ngā tini koeko.

translations.source_text: South Shetland Islands, discovered in 1819, are claimed by several nations and have the most bases, with sixteen active in 2020.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko nga Moutere o Shetland ki te Tonga, i kitea i te tau 1819, he maha nga iwi e kii ana me te nuinga o nga turanga, tekau ma ono e mahi ana i te tau 2020.
translations.true_target_text: Ko ngā Moutere o Shetland ki te Tonga, he moutere i kita i te tau 1819, e taunahatia ana e te nui ngā iwi o te ao, e 16 ngā moutere e rikarika ana.

translations.source_text: The archipelago lies 120 km north of the Peninsula. The largest is King George Island with the settlement of Villa Las Estrellas.
translations.pred_target_text: E 120 kiromita ki te taha raki o Te Moananui-a-Kiwa. Ko te motu nui rawa atu ko King George Island me te kainga o Villa Las Estrellas.
translations.true_target_text: Kei te noho te huinga motu te 120 km ki te raki o te Raenga Kūiti. Ko te mea nui rawa ko King George Island me tōna kāinga o Villa Las Estrellas.

translations.source_text: Others include Livingston Island, and Deception where the flooded caldera of a still-active volcano provides a spectacular natural harbour.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko etahi atu ko te Moutere o Livingston, me te Deception kei reira te puia o te puia e kaha tonu ana i te wai e whakarato ana i te whanga maori.
translations.true_target_text: Ko ētahi atu ko Livingston Island, me Deception kei reira tētahi whanga māori mīharo ki roto i te tawhā waipuke o tētahi rangitoto e oi tonu ana.

translations.source_text: Ellsworth Land is the region south of the Peninsula, bounded by the Bellingshausen Sea.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko Ellsworth Land te rohe ki te tonga o te Peninsula, te rohe o te moana Bellingshausen.
translations.true_target_text: Ko Ellsworth Land te takiwā ki te tonga o te raenga kūiti, e paengia ana e te Bellingshausen Sea.

translations.source_text: The mountains of the Peninsula here merge into the plateau, then re-emerge to form the 360 km chain of the Ellsworth Mountains, bisected by the Minnesota Glacier.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko nga maunga o te Peninsula i konei ka hono ki te paparahi, katahi ka puta ano ki te hanga i te mekameka 360 kiromita o nga maunga o Ellsworth, i wehea e te Minnesota Glacier.
translations.true_target_text: Ko ngā pae maunga o konei ka whai wāhi atu ki te mānia, katahi ka rewa ake anō ki te hanga i te 360 km hononga o ngā Māunga Ellsworth, e weheruangia ana e te awa kōpaka o Minnesota.

translations.source_text: The northern part or Sentinel Range has Antarctica's highest mountains, the Vinson Massif, peaking at 4892 m Mount Vinson.
translations.pred_target_text: Kei te taha raki, ko Sentinel Range ranei nga maunga teitei o Antarctica, te Vinson Massif, kei te 4892 m Maunga Vinson.
translations.true_target_text: Kei te wāhanga raki, kei te Sentinel Range rānei ngā maunga teitei o Te Kōpakatanga ki te Tonga, arā ko te Vinson Massif, ko tōna tihi nui ko Mount Vinson ki te 4892 m.

translations.source_text: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option.
translations.pred_target_text: I nga waahi mamao, karekau he waea pukoro, he waea amiorangi pea to whiringa anake.
translations.true_target_text: Ki ngā wāhi mohoao, karekau te pānga waea pūkoro, ko tētahi waea āmiorangi pea tō kōwhiringa kotahi.

translations.source_text: A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te waea amiorangi ehara i te mea hei whakakapi mo te waea pukoro, na te mea me noho koe ki waho me te maarama marama ki te peerangi ki te waea waea.
translations.true_target_text: Ehara te waea āmiorangi i te tino whakakapinga mō tētahi waea pūkoro, nā te mea me noho ki waho i te whare me te tirohanga wātea atu ki te āmiorangi kia pato i tētahi waeatanga atu.

translations.source_text: The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs.
translations.pred_target_text: He maha nga wa e whakamahia ana te ratonga e nga kaipuke, tae atu ki nga mahi whakangahau, tae atu ki nga haerenga e whai raraunga mamao ana me nga hiahia reo.
translations.true_target_text: Kei te whakamahia auautia te ratonga e te kaipuke, tae atu hoki ki ngā waka rēhia, waihoki ko ngā haerenga he hiahia ō rātou mō te raraunga me te reo mamao.

translations.source_text: Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.
translations.pred_target_text: Ka taea e to kaiwhakarato waea waea te tuku atu korero mo te hono atu ki tenei ratonga.
translations.true_target_text: Me āhei tō kaituku ratonga waea ā-rohe te hoatu i ētahi atu mōhiohio mō te tūhono ki tēnei ratonga.

translations.source_text: An increasingly more popular option for those planning a gap-year is to travel and learn.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko tetahi waahanga rongonui ake mo te hunga e whakamahere ana i te tau mokowhiti ko te haere me te ako.
translations.true_target_text: Ko tētahi kōwhiringa e piki haere ana te rorotu mō rātou e whakamahere ana i tētahi tau-waenga ko te hāereere me te ako.

translations.source_text: This is especially popular with school leavers, allowing them to take a year out before university, without compromising their education.
translations.pred_target_text: He tino rongonui tenei ki te hunga kua wehe i te kura, ka taea e ratou te tango i tetahi tau i mua i te whare wananga, me te kore e whakararu i to raatau maatauranga.
translations.true_target_text: He pai rawa atu tēnei ki ngā ika ā-whiro, e tukuna ana rātou kia whakatā mō te kotahi tau i runga i te mōhio ka kore e pā mai he raru ki ā rātou e whai tohu ana.

translations.source_text: In many cases, enrolling on a gap-year course abroad can actually improve your chances of moving into higher education back in your home country.
translations.pred_target_text: I te nuinga o nga wa, ko te whakauru ki tetahi akoranga mokowhiti-tau ki waho ka taea te whakapai ake i to tupono ki te neke ki te maatauranga teitei ki to whenua whenua.
translations.true_target_text: He nui ngā wā, ko te uru atu ki tētahi akoranga tau-waenga ki tāwāhi ka mātua whakapakari ake i te tupono ka neke atu koe ki te mātauranga teitei ake ki tō whenua ūkaipō.

translations.source_text: Typically there will be a tuition fee to enroll in these educational programs.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te tikanga ka whai utu utu mo te whakauru ki enei kaupapa ako.
translations.true_target_text: I te nuinga o te wā he utu kura kia whakauru ki ēnei kaupapa ako.

translations.source_text: Finland is a great boating destination. The "Land of a thousand lakes" has thousands of islands too, in the lakes and in the coastal archipelagos.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko Finland he waahi waka nui. Ko te "Whenua mano nga roto" he mano ano nga motu, kei roto i nga roto me nga motu takutai moana.
translations.true_target_text: He wāhi pai a Whinarana mō te taunga waka. Kei "Te Whenua o ngā rotomano", ngā motu manomano hoki, ki ngā roto me ngā huinga motu i te takutai.

translations.source_text: In the archipelagos and lakes you do not necessarily need a yacht.
translations.pred_target_text: I roto i nga motu me nga roto, kaore koe e hiahia ki te kaipuke.
translations.true_target_text: Mō te āhua ki ngā moutere me ngā roto, hei aha noa iho te hērā.

translations.source_text: Although the coastal archipelagos and the biggest lakes are indeed big enough for any yacht, smaller boats or even a kayak offer a different experience.
translations.pred_target_text: Ahakoa he tino nui nga motu o te takutai moana me nga roto nui rawa atu mo nga waaawa, he rereke nga wheako o nga poti iti me te waka waka.
translations.true_target_text: Ahakoa ka rawaka pū te rahi o ngā huinga motu taha ki te whenua, me ngā roto rawhi rawa mō tētahi iata, mā ngā poti paku iho, mā te kōreti rānei ka puta he wheako rerekē.

translations.source_text: Boating is a national pastime in Finland, with a boat to every seven or eight people.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te poti he mahi whakangahau mo te motu ki Finland, he poti ki ia tokowhitu, waru ranei nga tangata.
translations.true_target_text: He mahi pārekareka te eke kaipuke ki roto o Finland, ko te kaipuka kotahi ki 7 tāngata, 8 tāngata rānei.

translations.source_text: This is matched by Norway, Sweden and New Zealand, but otherwise quite unique (e.g. in the Netherlands the figure is one to forty).
translations.pred_target_text: Ka whakatauritea tenei e Norway, Sweden me Niu Tireni, engari he mea motuhake (hei tauira, i roto i te Netherlands ko te kotahi ki te wha tekau).
translations.true_target_text: I rite nei tēnei ki Nōwei, ki Huitene, ki Aotearoa hoki, engari tonu hoki he tino ahurei (hei tauira, ki te whenua Hōrana he tahi ki te whā tekau te nama).

translations.source_text: Most of the distinct Baltic Cruises feature an extended stay in St. Petersburg, Russia.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te nuinga o nga kaipuke Baltic Cruises he roa te noho ki St. Petersburg, Russia.
translations.true_target_text: Kei te nuinga o ngā Baltic Cruises tētahi noho āhua roa ki St. Petersburg, ki Rūhia.

translations.source_text: This means you can visit the historic city for a couple of full days while returning and sleeping on the ship at night.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te tikanga ka taea e koe te toro ki te taone rongonui mo nga ra e rua i te wa e hoki mai ana me te moe i runga i te kaipuke i te po.
translations.true_target_text: Ko te tikanga ka āhei mai ki tēnei whenua rirerire mō ngā rā e rua, ka hoki mai ki te kaipuke moe ai i ngā pō.

translations.source_text: If you only go ashore using shipboard excursions you will not need a separate visa (as of 2009).
translations.pred_target_text: Mena ka haere koe ki uta ma te whakamahi i nga haerenga kaipuke kaore koe e hiahia ki tetahi visa motuhake (no te tau 2009).
translations.true_target_text: Mēnā koe ka pae ki uta mā runga kaipike, kaore noa he take o te pane uruwhenua (atu i te tau 2009).

translations.source_text: Some cruises feature Berlin, Germany in the brochures. As you can see from the map above Berlin is no where near the sea and a visit to the city is not included in the price of the cruise.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko etahi o nga haerenga e whakaatu ana i a Berlin, Tiamana i roto i nga panui. Ka taea e koe te kite mai i te mapi i runga ake o Berlin kaore he waahi e tata ana ki te moana me te haerenga ki te taone kaore i uru ki te utu o te waka.
translations.true_target_text: Kei ngā puka o ētahi rerenga moana ko Berlin ki Tiamani. Ka kitea koe ki te mahere ki runga kāore i te paku tata a Berlin ki te moana, ā, ko te toronga ki te tāone nui kāore i roto i te utu o te rerenga.

translations.source_text: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te haere ma runga waka rererangi he wheako whakamataku mo nga tangata o nga reanga me nga ahuatanga katoa, ina koa kare ano ratou i rere i mua atu, i pa atu ranei ki tetahi huihuinga kino.
translations.true_target_text: Ka wehi te tangata ahakoa te pakeke ahakoa hoki nō hea ki te haerere mā te rererangi, ko te nuinga o te wā me kaore anō ia i rere, kua kino rānei tētahi wheakoranga.

translations.source_text: It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have.
translations.pred_target_text: Ehara i te mea hei whakama: kare he rereke mai i te mataku me te kore e pai ki etahi atu mea kei te nuinga o te tangata.
translations.true_target_text: Kāore he take kia whakamā: ehara i te rerekē i ngā mataku me ngā hae whaiaro ki ētahi atu mea kei te tokomaha.

translations.source_text: For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.
translations.pred_target_text: Mo etahi, ko te mohio ki nga mahi a te waka rererangi me nga mea ka puta i te wa o te rerenga ka awhina pea ki te hinga i te mataku i ahu mai i te kore mohio, i te kore ranei e whakahaere.
translations.true_target_text: Ki ētahi, mā te mārama ki ētahi āhuatanga o te mahi a ngā waka rererangi, me ngā mahi i te wā o te rerenga, he mea tautoko pea hei patu i te mataku e noho ana ki ngā āhuatanga kāore i te mōhiotia, o te noho kore mana whakahaere rānei.

translations.source_text: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair.
translations.pred_target_text: He pai te utu o nga kamupene karere mo te tuku tere. I te nuinga o te wa, he mea nui te wa me nga tuhinga pakihi, taonga hokohoko, waahanga e manawapa ranei mo te whakatikatika tere.
translations.true_target_text: E utua paitia ana ngā kamupene koria mō te kawe tere i ngā mea. He nui ngā wā, he hirahira te wā mō te taha ki ngā pukapuka kamupene, ki ngā taputapu, ki ngā wāhanga mō tētahi whakatikanga whitawhita.

translations.source_text: On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem.
translations.pred_target_text: I etahi huarahi, kei nga kamupene nui ake o raatau rererangi, engari mo etahi atu huarahi me nga umanga iti he raru.
translations.true_target_text: I ētahi ara, he rererangi tā tēnā kamupene, tā tēnā kamupene, engari mō ētahi atu rā, i pā mai ētahi raruraru.

translations.source_text: If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs.
translations.pred_target_text: Mena ka tukuna e ratou etahi mea ma runga waka rererangi, i etahi huarahi ka roa pea nga ra ki te tango i nga uta me nga tikanga.
translations.true_target_text: Mēnā rātou i tono i ngā mea mā runga, i ētahi ara ka ruarua pea ngā rā e uru mai ai i te wāhi tangotango me te whakatō.

translations.source_text: The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te huarahi anake kia tere ake ai ko te tuku hei tueke kua takina. Kare nga ture a nga waka rererangi e tuku i a raatau ki te tuku tueke me te kore he pahihi, kei reira koe ka uru mai.
translations.true_target_text: E tere ake ai, me tuku ki te wāhi tuku pēke. Ko ngā ture a te taunga rererangi, ka kore e tukuna ngā pēke ki te kore tētahi tangata e rere, ko koe tēnā.

translations.source_text: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you).
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te huarahi tino marama mo te rere i te akomanga tuatahi, pakihi ranei ko te kohi moni nui mo te painga (he pai ake ranei, me tono to kamupene ki te mahi maau).
translations.true_target_text: Ko te huarahi mārakerake te kite mō te rere i ngā tūru rangatira i ngā tūru mahi rānei he hoatu i tētahi moni mātotoru ki te hunga whairawa ( ka pai ake mēnā ka taea e koe tō kamupene te mahi māu).

translations.source_text: However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class!
translations.pred_target_text: Heoi, ehara tenei i te mea iti: na runga i nga tikanga pakeke, ka taea e koe te utu kia wha nga wa te utu ohaoha mo nga umanga, me te tekau ma tahi nga wa mo te akomanga tuatahi!
translations.true_target_text: Heoi anō, ehara i te mea he iti te utu o tēnei: hei tohu āwhiwhi, ka utu pea koe i te whā whakareatanga o te utu iti te utu noa mō te pakihi, me te tekau mā tahi whakareanga mō te taumata tuatahi!

translations.source_text: Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B.
translations.pred_target_text: I te nuinga o te korero, kaore he take mo te rapu utu utu mo nga tuuru pakihi, akomanga tuatahi ranei i runga i nga rerenga rererangi mai i A ki B.
translations.true_target_text: I te nuinga o te wā, kāore he paku take o te rapu noa i ngā hekenga utu mō ngā tūru pakihi, karaehe-tuatahi rānei ki ngā rerenga tōtika i A ki B.

translations.source_text: Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.
translations.pred_target_text: Kei te mohio nga kamupene rererangi kei reira tetahi roopu matua o nga rererangi e pai ana ki te utu i te taara teitei mo te whai waahi ki te haere tere me te noho humarie, me te utu i runga i te utu.
translations.true_target_text: Kei te mōhio pai ngā umanga waka rererangi he rōpū matua o te hunga rere e pai ana ki te utu i te utu nui rawa kia tae tere atu, āhuru atu ki tētahi wāhi, ā, ka pērā te whakarite utu.

translations.source_text: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko Chişinău te whakapaipai o Moldova. Ko te reo o te rohe he Romanian, engari he nui te reo Ruhia.
translations.true_target_text: Ko te tāone matua o Moldova ko Chisinau. Ko tō rātou reo ko te reo Romānia engari kei te kōrerotia whānuitia te reo Rūhia.

translations.source_text: Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko Moldova he repupirikana-a-iwi kua pa ki nga raruraru a-iwi.
translations.true_target_text: Ko Moldova tētahi whenua tini mātāwaka kua pāngia e te raru mātāwaka.

translations.source_text: In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country.
translations.pred_target_text: I te tau 1994, na tenei pakanga i ara ake te hanganga o te Transnistria Republic i te rawhiti o Moldova, kei a ia ano tana kawanatanga me tana moni engari kaore i te mohiotia e tetahi whenua mema UN.
translations.true_target_text: I te tau 1994, i ara ake tēnei pakanga ki te hanganga o te Transnistria Republic ki te rāwhiti o Moldova nā rātou anō i whakapuaki, kei a rātou tō rātou ake kāwanatanga, pūnaha moni anō hoki, engari kāore i te whakamanatia e tētahi atu whenua he mema nō te Kotahitanga o Ngā Iwi o te Ao.

translations.source_text: Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations.
translations.pred_target_text: Kua whakaritea ano nga hononga ohaoha i waenganui i enei wahanga e rua o Moldova ahakoa te kore o nga whiriwhiringa torangapu.
translations.true_target_text: Kua whakatūria anō ngā hononga ohaoha i waenganui i ēnei wāhanga e rua o Moldova ahakoa te hinganga ki ngā whakaritenga tōrangapū.

translations.source_text: The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te karakia nui i Moldova he Karaitiana Orthodox.
translations.true_target_text: Ko te hāhi matua ki Moldova ko te Karaitiana Tūturu.

translations.source_text: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko İzmir te tuatoru o nga taone nui rawa atu i Turkey me te taupori tata ki te 3.7 miriona, te tauranga tuarua tuarua i muri i Istanbul, me te waahi kawe waka tino pai.
translations.true_target_text: Ko Izmir te tāone nui he tuatoru tōna rahi ki Turkey me te taupori o te tata ki te 3.7 miriona, te xxx tuarua te rahi whai muri i Istanbul, me tētahi poka pū ikiiki tino pai.

translations.source_text: Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te taone tawhito o Smyrna i mua, he pokapū hokohoko hou, whakawhanakehia, me te pukumahi, kei te taha o te kokoru nui, ka karapotia e nga maunga.
translations.true_target_text: I tētahi wā te taone ukiuki nei o Smyrna, i tēnei wā he hou, he whanaketanga me tētahi pokapū e pōkea ana ki te mahi, ā, kei te takiwa o tētahi koko nui me ngā māunga e karapoti nei.

translations.source_text: The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko nga huarahi whanui, nga whare karaehe o mua me nga pokapu hokohoko hou e kapi ana i nga tuanui whero-tapa tawhito, te maakete o te rau tau 1800, me nga whare karakia me nga whare karakia tawhito, ahakoa he ahua o te taone nui o Mediterranean Europe atu i Turkey tuku iho.
translations.true_target_text: Ko ngā huarahi whānui, ko ngā whare he karāhe te pakitara o mua, me ngā pokapū hokohoko hou e kōtingotingo ana i waenga i ngā tuanui papauku-whero, te mākete nō te rautau 18, me ngā mosque me ngā whare karakia tawhito, ahakoa kei te tāone nui te wairua ka nui ake te Mediterranean Europe i te Tākei o mua.

translations.source_text: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church.
translations.pred_target_text: Ko te kainga o Haldarsvík e whakaatu ana i nga tirohanga o te motu tata o Eysturoy, he whare karakia octagonal rereke.
translations.true_target_text: Ko tā te kāinga o Haldarsvik he tirohanga ki te motu tata o Esturoy, ā, he karakia tapawaru rerekē ki reira.

translations.source_text: In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs.

translations.source_text: It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.

translations.source_text: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron.

translations.source_text: Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.

translations.source_text: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population.

translations.source_text: Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis.

translations.source_text: Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.

translations.source_text: Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant.

translations.source_text: While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is "bien élevé" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier.
translations.pred_target_text: Ahakoa he ahua kino noa iho tenei, ko te huarahi pai ki te noho pai ki Paris ko te noho pai ki a koe, kia rite ki te tangata "bien élevé" (he pai te whakatipu). Ka tino ngawari ake te haere.

translations.source_text: Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies.

translations.source_text: It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude.

translations.source_text: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too.

translations.source_text: Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance.

translations.source_text: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout.

translations.source_text: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence.

translations.source_text: It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.

translations.source_text: Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.

translations.source_text: Persian has a relatively easy and mostly regular grammar.

translations.source_text: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century.

translations.source_text: Plants look their best when in a natural environment, so resist the temptation to remove even "just one" specimen.
